Entry.JapaneseText: 俺は<Eugene>・ガラルド。 俺はカレギアに命を捧げた男だ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm <Eugene> Gallardo. I am a man who has dedicated my life to Callegea.

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの空にたちこめる黒い雲を消し去り、 光を取り戻すため、俺は戦い続ける……
Entry.EnglishText: To return light to Callegea's skies that have been shrouded by dark clouds, I continue to fight...
